019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
031import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
032import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.KubernetesApiResponse;
033import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesListObject;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
035import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
036import java.util.Optional;
037import java.util.function.Function;
038
039/**
040 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
041 */
042@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
043public class NamespacedCustomObjectStub {
044    private final CustomObjectsApi api;
045    private final String group;
046    private final String version;
047    private final String namespace;
048    private final String plural;
049    private final String name;
050    private final GenericKubernetesApi<DynamicKubernetesObject,
051            DynamicKubernetesListObject> gkApi;
052
053    /**
054     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
055     *
056     * @param api the api
057     * @param group the group
058     * @param version the version
059     * @param namespace the namespace
060     * @param plural the plural
061     * @param name the name
062     */
063    protected NamespacedCustomObjectStub(CustomObjectsApi api, String group,
064            String version, String namespace, String plural, String name) {
065        this.api = api;
066        this.group = group;
067        this.version = version;
068        this.namespace = namespace;
069        this.plural = plural;
070        this.name = name;
071        gkApi = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(DynamicKubernetesObject.class,
072            DynamicKubernetesListObject.class, group, version, plural, api);
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Gets the group.
077     *
078     * @return the group
079     */
080    public String group() {
081        return group;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Gets the version.
086     *
087     * @return the version
088     */
089    public String version() {
090        return version;
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Gets the namespace.
095     *
096     * @return the namespace
097     */
098    public String namespace() {
099        return namespace;
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Gets the plural.
104     *
105     * @return the plural
106     */
107    public String plural() {
108        return plural;
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Gets the name.
113     *
114     * @return the name
115     */
116    public String name() {
117        return name;
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Get a namespaced custom object stub. If the version in parameter
122     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
123     * matching group and kind. 
124     *
125     * @param client the client
126     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
127     * @param namespace the namespace
128     * @param name the name
129     * @return the dynamic kubernetes api
130     * @throws ApiException the api exception
131     */
132    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
133        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
134    public static Optional<NamespacedCustomObjectStub>
135            get(ApiClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk,
136                    String namespace, String name) throws ApiException {
137        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
138        var group = gvk.getGroup();
139        var kind = gvk.getKind();
140        String plural = null;
141        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(gvk.getVersion())) {
142            var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
143            var versions = apis.getGroups().stream()
144                .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(group)).findFirst()
145                .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
146                .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
147            for (var version : versions) {
148                var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(group, version)
149                    .getResources().stream()
150                    .filter(r -> kind.equals(r.getKind()))
151                    .findFirst();
152                if (crdApiRes.isPresent()) {
153                    gvk = new GroupVersionKind(group, version, kind);
154                    // Shortcut, avoid calling this twice
155                    plural = crdApiRes.get().getName();
156                    break;
157                }
158            }
159        }
160        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(gvk.getVersion())) {
161            return Optional.empty();
162        }
163        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(plural)) {
164            var crdApiRes
165                = coa.getAPIResources(gvk.getGroup(), gvk.getVersion())
166                    .getResources().stream()
167                    .filter(r -> kind.equals(r.getKind())).findFirst();
168            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
169                return Optional.empty();
170            }
171            plural = crdApiRes.get().getName();
172        }
173        return Optional
174            .of(new NamespacedCustomObjectStub(coa, gvk.getGroup(),
175                gvk.getVersion(), namespace, plural, name));
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
180     *
181     * @return the dynamic kubernetes object
182     * @throws ApiException the api exception
183     */
184    public DynamicKubernetesObject state() throws ApiException {
185        var call = api.getNamespacedCustomObjectCall(group, version,
186            namespace, plural, name, null);
187        var data = api.getApiClient().<JsonObject> execute(call,
188            JsonObject.class).getData();
189        return new DynamicKubernetesObject(data);
190    }
191
192    /**
193     * Updates the object's status.
194     *
195     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
196     * @param status function that returns the new status
197     * @return the kubernetes api response
198     * @throws ApiException the api exception
199     */
200    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
201            updateStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject object,
202                    Function<DynamicKubernetesObject, Object> status)
203                    throws ApiException {
204        return gkApi.updateStatus(object, status).throwsApiException();
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Updates the status.
209     *
210     * @param status the status
211     * @return the kubernetes api response
212     * @throws ApiException the api exception
213     */
214    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
215            updateStatus(Function<DynamicKubernetesObject, Object> status)
216                    throws ApiException {
217        return updateStatus(state(), status);
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Patch the object.
222     *
223     * @param patchType the patch type
224     * @param patch the patch
225     * @param options the options
226     * @return the kubernetes api response
227     * @throws ApiException the api exception
228     */
229    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject> patch(
230            String patchType, V1Patch patch, PatchOptions options)
231            throws ApiException {
232        return gkApi.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options)
233            .throwsApiException();
234    }
235
236    /**
237     * Patch the object using default options.
238     *
239     * @param patchType the patch type
240     * @param patch the patch
241     * @return the kubernetes api response
242     * @throws ApiException the api exception
243     */
244    public KubernetesApiResponse<DynamicKubernetesObject>
245            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
246        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
247        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
248    }
249}
